name: part_006
file: tmp_【#REBIRTH3D】Kureiji Ollie's 3D Birthday LIVE 2024 - REBIRTH, The True Me【hololive Indonesia】 [O607BZ8HwDk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Juggernaut' by Kureiji Ollie.
Story interlude: Ollie realizes her new powers while walking through a city.
Performance of the song 'Undead Alice' by Kureiji Ollie.

subtitles.original: ...分かってたんだ
subtitles.english: ...I knew it all along

subtitles.original: 誰もが置き去りにした世界で
subtitles.english: In a world that everyone left behind

subtitles.original: はじまりの歌を歌い続ける
subtitles.english: I keep singing the song of beginnings

subtitles.original: もう気づいてたんだ
subtitles.english: I already realized it

subtitles.original: ひどく嗄れた声はきっと
subtitles.english: This terribly hoarse voice will surely

subtitles.original: まだ見ぬ君に届いている
subtitles.english: Reach you, whom I've yet to see

subtitles.original: ねえ聴こえてるでしょう？
subtitles.english: Hey, you can hear it, right?

subtitles.original: 鏡の中の自分に
subtitles.english: To the self inside the mirror

subtitles.original: 巡り巡る今日を
subtitles.english: The recurring today

subtitles.original: 刻んでいく音を
subtitles.english: The sound that carves it

subtitles.original: はじめて出会ったんだ
subtitles.english: I met it for the first time

subtitles.original: 鏡の中の自分に
subtitles.english: The self inside the mirror

subtitles.original: 巡り巡る今日を
subtitles.english: The recurring today

subtitles.original: 刻んでいく音を
subtitles.english: The sound that carves it

subtitles.original: Jadi, begitu!
subtitles.english: Now I see!

subtitles.original: Ini kah alasan aku hidup kembali?
subtitles.english: So this was why I was brought back to life...

subtitles.original: Dihidupkan kembali... untuk menghidupkan kembali!
subtitles.english: I was brought back to life, to give life!

subtitles.original: Kesempatan kedua...
subtitles.english: A second chance...

subtitles.original: Kembalinya peluang...
subtitles.english: Another shot...

subtitles.original: Kelahiran kembali...
subtitles.english: Rebirth...

subtitles.original: Semuanya masuk akal!
subtitles.english: It makes sense now!

subtitles.original: Tapi, kenapa kekuatanku baru muncul sekarang ya?
subtitles.english: But, I wonder why these powers only manifested now though...?

subtitles.original: Ah! Jangan-jangan...
subtitles.english: Oh! Could it be...

subtitles.original: Karena sebelumnya aku pernah memakai kekuatan ini...
subtitles.english: That I used my own powers on... Myself?

subtitles.original: Kekuatan ini aku pakai untuk bangkit kembali...
subtitles.english: I used these powers to come back to life...

subtitles.original: Sehingga butuh waktu untuk energinya kembali.
subtitles.english: And it took many of its energies... for the power to return.

subtitles.original: Masuk akal sih.
subtitles.english: That would explain a lot.

subtitles.original: Ternyata benar kata chat, aku bisa membuat orang jadi zombie!
subtitles.english: I guess chat was right, I could turn people into zombies...

subtitles.original: Walaupun dalam makna yang berbeda.
subtitles.english: Just, in a different light...

subtitles.original: Rasanya seperti bisa menghidupkan apapun!
subtitles.english: I feel like I could reanimate anything!

subtitles.original: Tapi, aku tahu apa yang ingin aku hidupkan kembali terlebih dahulu.
subtitles.english: Well, I know what I'll be reviving first!

subtitles.original: Para harapan.
subtitles.english: Hope.

subtitles.original: Mimpi.
subtitles.english: Dreams.

subtitles.original: Keinginan.
subtitles.english: Wishes.

subtitles.original: Motivasi!
subtitles.english: Motivation...

subtitles.original: Akan aku buat semua bunga layu itu... mati suri!
subtitles.english: I'll make those wilted flowers undead!

subtitles.original: アンデッドアリスへ
subtitles.english: To Undead Alice

subtitles.original: 思うようにいけないなら私を捨て
subtitles.english: If things don't go as you wish, then throw me away

subtitles.original: 君は生きて
subtitles.english: And you, live on

subtitles.original: 狂ってんだ君の残響は
subtitles.english: It's crazy, your reverberation

subtitles.original: 僕じゃなくたって聴こえるのに
subtitles.english: Can be heard even if it's not by me

subtitles.original: 自傷案を募るたびに
subtitles.english: Every time self-harming ideas gather

subtitles.original: 幸せ吸って毒を吐いて
subtitles.english: I inhale happiness and exhale poison

subtitles.original: 幻想ジャンキー 二人だけが
subtitles.english: Illusion junkie, just the two of us

subtitles.original: 正常なんて気持ちいいじゃんか
subtitles.english: Being normal feels good, doesn't it?

subtitles.original: 会いたいも貸した病が
subtitles.english: Even "wanting to meet" is a lent illness

subtitles.original: 愛なくて惚れた不幸が
subtitles.english: Being in love without love is a misfortune

subtitles.original: 仲良くなっちゃってヤバそうらや
subtitles.english: Getting along and it looks dangerous

subtitles.original: ドキドキドキになっちゃって
subtitles.english: It's becoming a heart-pounding mess

subtitles.original: 僕が君を殺す前に
subtitles.english: Before I kill you

subtitles.original: 死んでくれ
subtitles.english: Please die

subtitles.original: ずるしていいよ
subtitles.english: It's okay to cheat

subtitles.original: ずるくていいよ
subtitles.english: It's okay to be sly

subtitles.original: 壊していいよ
subtitles.english: It's okay to break it

subtitles.original: 怖くていいよ
subtitles.english: It's okay to be afraid

subtitles.original: 卑怯な愛はここに埋めよう
subtitles.english: Let's bury this cowardly love here

subtitles.original: 忘れるんだこんなのもうやめよう
subtitles.english: Forget it, let's stop this already

subtitles.original: 尖ったほうが嫌っていで
subtitles.english: It's better to be sharp and hated

subtitles.original: も想ったほうが重くていいじゃんか
subtitles.english: But it's better to be heavy if you care

subtitles.original: もう笑えない僕の アンデッドアリスへ
subtitles.english: To my Undead Alice, who can no longer laugh

subtitles.original: 理想通り僕の夢が
subtitles.english: My dreams go exactly as ideal

subtitles.original: 輝くほど陽は陰ってって
subtitles.english: The more they shine, the more the sun sets

subtitles.original: 犠牲を我慢と呼んで
subtitles.english: Calling sacrifice "patience"

subtitles.original: 汚れた手で鍵を回した
subtitles.english: I turned the key with dirty hands

subtitles.original: 悪いようにしないように
subtitles.english: So as not to make it bad

subtitles.original: それが詰まり悪い形
subtitles.english: That's eventually a bad shape

subtitles.original: 保存状態 相俟って
subtitles.english: Preservation state combined

subtitles.original: 何度も居た墓を埋めました
subtitles.english: I buried the grave I'd been in many times

subtitles.original: はだけられた本能が
subtitles.english: The bared instinct

subtitles.original: 正しくなことの希望が
subtitles.english: The hope of not being right

subtitles.original: 仲良くなっちゃってヤバそうらや
subtitles.english: Getting along and it looks dangerous

subtitles.original: ノロノロノになっちゃって
subtitles.english: It's becoming sluggish

subtitles.original: 僕が僕を殺す前に
subtitles.english: Before I kill myself

subtitles.original: 死んでやる
subtitles.english: I'll die

subtitles.original: ずるしていいよ
subtitles.english: It's okay to cheat

subtitles.original: ずるくていいよ
subtitles.english: It's okay to be sly

subtitles.original: 壊していいよ
subtitles.english: It's okay to break it

subtitles.original: 怖くていいよ
subtitles.english: It's okay to be afraid

subtitles.original: 卑怯な愛はここに埋めよう
subtitles.english: Let's bury this cowardly love here

subtitles.original: 忘れるんだこんなのもうやめよう
subtitles.english: Forget it, let's stop this already

subtitles.original: 尖ったほうが嫌っていで
subtitles.english: It's better to be sharp and hated

subtitles.original: も想ったほうが重くていいじゃんか
subtitles.english: But it's better to be heavy if you care

subtitles.original: もう笑えない僕の アンデッドアリスへ
subtitles.english: To my Undead Alice, who can no longer laugh

subtitles.original: ずっとこのまま ふたりで夢を見れるって
subtitles.english: That we can keep dreaming together just like this

subtitles.original: 勝手ばかりで 君はどんな顔で笑っていたっけ
subtitles.english: Selfishly, I wonder what kind of face you were laughing with

subtitles.original: バイバイしたから 元通りなんて幻想だ
subtitles.english: Since we said goodbye, getting back to normal is an illusion

subtitles.original: バイバイ辛いじゃん 胸を裂いて愛を潰してくれよ
subtitles.english: Goodbye is painful, isn't it? Rip my chest open and crush the love

subtitles.english: It's okay to be afraid

subtitles.english: Let's bury this cowardly love here

subtitles.english: But it's better to be heavy if you care
